artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Claude-Louis Desrais; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: From fashion periodical (P.15,193.1); a man holding a walking stick wearing black breeches, pink and white striped socks and vest, a purple, blue, and gold striped coat, and a black hat with a pink band
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Plate II from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Dix-septième Cahier, 30 Avril 1787
